❯ /co
────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
  /compact                Clear conversation history but keep a summary in context. Optional: /compact [instructions …
  /context                Visualize current context usage as a colored grid
  /config                 Open config panel
